features: ★【10X,3X,2X,1X MAGNIFICATION】 The lighted makeup mirror has 4 panels magnifying and wide-angle viewing, 10X,3X,2X magnification; see clearly your face and make a flawless makeup. Suitable for desk makeup and handheld use. The attached detachable 10X magnifying mirror is very suitable for applying eyeliner and mascara, modifying eyebrows, etc.
★【ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS】 You only need to touch the on/off button long enough to adjust the brightness of the mirror, and you can apply makeup in poor lighting areas.
★【DUAL POWER SUPPLY】 The LED makeup mirror with lights can be powered by USB charging cable or 4xAAA batteries; batteries not included.

★【FREE DEGREE ROTATION AND REMOVABLE BASE】Adjust the makeup mirror as per the suitable viewing angle you need; You can fix the LED vanity mirror at any position as needed, rotate the 2X/3X/10X magnifying mirror on it to get the perfect view. It is a 3 panels vanity mirrors provided with wide angle viewing, Convenient for men's shaving and women's makeup; A removable base from the cosmetic mirror, good for traveling.

★【CUSTOMER FIRST】 If you have any questions please feel free to contact us, we will give you the best answer in the first time. This product is also your best choice for gifts. Birthday gift, Valentine's Day gift, Mother’s Day gift, Father's Day gift, Christmas gifts for family, wife, husband, boyfriend, or girlfriend, or another special day gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How does the mirror work? There are two ways to run the makeup mirror: First, use a USB charging cable to connect the charging port. Second, you can put a 4xAAA battery behind the mirror. How long will the mirror run on batteries? Because each person uses the makeup mirror to choose different brightness use time is uncertain. Is the brightness adjustable? Long press the mirror button to adjust the brightness of the light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a small make-up area
reviews.reviewText: This is not a huge mirror, but it was the perfect size for the new vanity area we set up for my daughter.I like that it’s got USB power so it can use electricity most of the time for the lights, but my daughter likes the battery power because it means she can take it up in her top bunk when she wants to play with her jewelry up there.The lights are nice and bright and the little suction cup mirror is a nice bonus. I don’t think the mirrors are glass, which I prefer since my daughter is younger. It’s nice and lightweight. The little dish in the stand if perfect for stashing a favorite piece of jewelry or lip balm for easy access.Overall, a purchase I am happy with. I’d gladly buy it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror has a lot of features such as different angles, magnifying, and lighting. Great for the visually impaired or older person who struggles to see when applying makeup. Price was good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute mirror for vanity
reviews.reviewText: The light is pretty nice and works well. I wish they had 3x and 10x panels. Did not need 2x and 3x as the magnification is pretty close. True they have the 10x as an additional one. I just think it would have been nice to just have the 3x and 10x as a folding panels. But overall it is pretty good. The quality is medium but then again the price is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my gf
reviews.reviewText: She loves these mirrors. The lighting with dimming feature is perfect for her vanity when she's putting her makeup on.

reviews.reviewerName: I bought this toy for my mixture Dachshund and just loves I give this toy a two thumbs up review
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's very high quality product
reviews.reviewText: I use it to put my makeup on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is very pretty. It was a present so I wanted the packaging to be cute as well; it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lights are bright, and sets up easily
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t owned a mirror like this since I was a teenager! Getting rid of my mirror back then was extremely difficult because I loved it so much!This one is so much better than my og model. Although mine had different lighting selections as far as color goes and brightness, this one is sturdy, brightness selector is easy and the mirror isn’t so large I can’t fit it on my vanity. I love that it folds to keep the mirror clean and looking new.I highly recommend these mirrors for all girls!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work with batteries
reviews.reviewText: The battery option doesn't work. I returned the 1st one and got a 2nd and that one doesn't work either. They work with a USB cord but I want what I paid for. It's nice that you can adjust the lighting. It is quite bright. I wish it worked correctly.
Our daughter actually bought this as a birthday gift for her friend and checked it out first and found it had nice features and quality with a decent price.
This is very very nice . I use it daily. The angles and lighting is spot on. Easy to shift around.
A good purchase, daughter loves it. Wish it wasn't all plastic. Feels like a Barbie mirror without much substance.

reviews.reviewTitle: The dot lights make it really hard to look at the mirror
reviews.reviewText: Overall. It works….the lighting being dots makes it hard to look at. Go with a solid light around instead is my recommendation
